thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 17 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Morphosys to increase capital to implement Offering Of 8.3 mln ADS

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Morphosys to increase capital to implement Offering Of 8.3 mln ADS
text:
April 17 (Reuters) - MorphoSys AG:
* DGAP-ADHOC: MORPHOSYS RESOLVES A CAPITAL INCREASE TO IMPLEMENT THE OFFERING OF 8,300,000 AMERICAN DEPOSITARY SHARES (ADS) IN THE UNITED STATES
* TO INCREASE SHARE CAPITAL OF MORPHOSYS AG BY ISSUING 2.1 MILLION NEW SHARES, EXCLUDING PRE-EMPTIVE RIGHTS OF EXISTING SHAREHOLDERS
* TO IMPLEMENT IPO IN UNITED STATES OF 8.3 MILLION AMERICAN DEPOSITARY SHARES PURSUANT TO A REGISTRATION STATEMENT ON FORM F-1
* PRICING OF OFFERING IS EXPECTED TO OCCUR ON APRIL 18, 2018, FOLLOWING END OF BOOKBUILDING IN UNITED STATES Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
